author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
In this PR a contradiction between "FineCalo" mechanism of MCTruth and GFlash hit sampling in ECAL is resolved. In the case of GFlash sampling of hits, there is no Geant4 touchable defined, which provoke a crash. 

Another fix is introduce in low-energy GFlash model.

These modifications should not affect baseline simulation.

#### PR validation:
private
title: Fixed fast sim sampling of ECAL hits
